content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for considering my apartment. I am looking for a fair rental price that will meet my needs as a landlord. Would you be able to provide me with an offer for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. How much are you willing to accept?

You: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I am sorry, but I am unable to accept that price. I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains as a landlord. Would you be able to provide a higher offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. What is the highest price you would accept?

You: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I am sorry, but I am unable to accept that price either. I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains as a landlord. Would you be able to provide a higher offer?
name: Heinrich Heine
